Text: Many thanks for these great literary uploads!
Loving your uploads! Thank you so much.

azizex666
love,love,love, your series of booker prize winners etc. The NY times uoload with a bonus fiction series was phenominal. Don't stop the music.
I read to my granddaughter twice a week. She is just seven but can read like a 11 year old. Do you have any reccomendations. I do not care for most of the Newberry prize winners. They are what adults would like to think kids should read. They have forgotten what it is like to be 5 or 10 years old. It should have an edge, and flights of imagination and adventure. Not a nice packaged metaphor full of the thoughts we think  our children should have. Sorry that's not how it works. If you have any help fire away. Thanks again for everything.
